title: Posters
description: I love making posters, I often use metaphors in my works.

title: Logos
description: Logos should be clear and simple. I think I'm good at making nice logos.

title: UI-UX
description: A lot of people want to become web designers... I want too! :DD

title: Others
description: Realistic illustrations seem boring to me. I prefer to improvise with abstract patterns.

title: Packing
description: Packaging is the face of the product! It should be attractive and interesting. And most importantly, to distinguish the product among similar ones.

title: Covers
description: Album covers are beautiful! I hope you also think my design is wonderful
